main/aurora_outdated_info: Aurora's developers keep updating the template regularly. We add features, bug fixes and improve the template. Some updates are mandatory, and you should update to latest version from the Template overview.
theme/shadoweffects_info_label: Adds Shadow Effect to some cards and widgets, not visible on dark mode!
theme/preloaderview_info_label: If enabled, a loading screen will show when loading the website.
connections/discordid_info_label: To get the Server ID, go to Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget > Server ID > Copy. {{moreinfoLinkStart}}Read more.{{moreinfoLinkEnd}}.
connections/discordview_info_label: This in navbar on the left. To get it to work, you have to enable Server Widget in Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget. Don't forget to make an Invite Channel.
addons/widgetbot_info: This feature is not tested properly. Visit Widgetbot official documentation {{wbLinkStart}}here{{wbLinkEnd}}.
addons/serverid_info_label: To get the Server ID, go to Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget > Server ID > Copy.
addons/channelid_info_label: To get channel ID, go to Discord Server, then right click on channel > Copy ID.
navbar/modernnav_info: To move the store button to center, go to Configuration > Navigation and change the Store position. The button is automatically enabled if theres Custom Page or Module called Store.
navbar/navbarlogo_info_label: This is a logo in the middle of navbar.
navbar/navbarbanner_info_label: This is a banner image appeared behind of logo.
navbar/navbarexclude_info_label: Exclude specified links seperated with {{slashCodeStart}}/{{slashCodeEnd}} from the navigation bar.
navbar/navbarstyle_info_label: Sets style of content below the sticky navbar.
navbar/navbartype_info_label: Select a type of navbar that appears at top. This won't work if Navbar Style is Modern.
card/custom_content_not_set: Warning! Custom Content not set in Configuration > General Settings
card/cardcontent_info: These settings require Custom Content to be enabled at Configuration > General Settings.
portal/portal_not_set: Warning! Portal not set in Configuration > General Settings
portal/portal_info: These settings require Portal to be enabled at Configuration > General Settings.
options/customcss_info_label: Here you can paste your CSS.
options/customjs_info_label: Here you can paste your JS.
welcome/welcomesection_info_label: This appears below the navbar when a user is guest/not logged in
home/review_info: Aurora is welcoming github contributors. You can start contributing by forking {{riLinkStart}}this repo{{riLinkEnd}}.
home/require_support_desc: Join our Discord server for issues, questions, suggestions, theme updates, guides and more.
home/rate_theme_desc: Thanks for using our theme, leave a 5-star positive review on NamelessMC resource page.
module/send_feedback: Send a feedback to your favourite resource!
